display_help: By bouncing a carefully pitched sound wave off an ally's ear drum, you can free him from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, or Immobilize effects, and leave him resistant to such effects for a good while. Protection will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Clarity also provides your ally enhanced perception. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Terrorize, Confusion), +Perception
display_target_help: The soothing waves of sound clear your mind of all Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power, and improve his Perception.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.
